about_the_game:
Beat Games studio brings fresh beats from Timbaland to Beat Saber! Dive into the pulsing music of Timbaland and slash the beats in our brand new Timbaland Music Pack. See you on the leaderboards!

Timbaland Music Pack includes the tracks:

- Sid Tipton & Timbaland - 'Has A Meaning'
- Kaydence & Timbaland - 'Dumb Thingz'
- Wavezswavesz - 'While We’re Young'
- Nash Overstreet, Karra & Common Strangers - 'What I Like'
- Bruno Martini & Timbaland - 'Famous ft. Jake Davis'

Timbaland Music Pack is brought to you by BeatClub.

Get the track 'While We’re Young' by Wavezswavesz, slash the beats, and show the world how you rock! This track is part of Timbaland Music Pack, brought to you by BeatClub.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
